CustomField.defaultValue: 'If you are a UK tax payer and tick Yes to Gift Aid the government will give us 25% on top of your donation. It doesnt cost you a penny, and helps to keep us going'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you are a UK tax payer and tick 'Yes' to Gift Aid the government will give us 25% on top of your donation. It doesn't cost you a penny, and helps to keep us going
CustomField.label: Gift Aid Declaration
